Package: uniandes.unacloud.web.domain

[Groovy] Class Image

    • uniandes.unacloud.web.domain.Image

    • Entity to represent an image which is represented by group of files to be executed by a platform.

      Authors:
      CesarF

          indicates if the image is public or not

      • Methods Summary

          Methods 
          Type Name and description
          java.lang.Object freeze()
          Changes the state of image to IN_QUEUE and clusters where it is embedded this method is used to avoid that image in cluster could not be deployed
          java.lang.Long getDatabaseId()
          Returns database id
          Platform getPlatform()
          returns platform
          java.lang.String getSize()
          Returns the size of image in GB, MB, KB
